title: IPartingLineFeatureData.ISetEntitiesToSplit
description: Sets the entities to use to split a face and add edges to the parting line feature.
signature:
void ISetEntitiesToSplit( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   ref System.Object
EntIn
)

parameters.name: EntIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of vertices or sketch segments VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
If sketch segments and vertices are specified, then a pair of vertices appear together; for example, segment1, vtx11, vtx12, segment2, vtx21, vtx22, vtx31, vtx32, and so on.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
